index:
Welcome to Emotes Open Collection!

Use the navbar to search, or log-in to upload your own emotes!

The animations are working on every minecraft version with the latest mod.


Emotecraft mod

Emotecraft Wiki
wiki made by KaleKo

Download the mod:
  • CurseForge:
    • for Fabric
    • for Forge
  • Modrinth
  • GitHub


This project is Open Source!
Running an ad-free web service is not free, if you like my work, feel free to donate me!
{$support}
If possible, use Ko-Fi, it takes less fee.
oauth_mismatch: Mismatched oauth state, probably you waited for too long, please try again
select_method:
Please select one method to log-in!

To register, first log-in with an account,
and follow the form.
check_form:
Register

Please verify/check the form below, and press register to finish your account
username_taken: The username is already taken, please choose another one
username_invalid: Please choose a valid username, only contains letters and numbers
not_logged_in: You are not logged in, please log in!
upload_failed: Emote upload failed, please check your file before re-uploading
unknown_error: Unknown error, please check your input and try again!
UUID_exists: Emote with this UUID already exists.
github_failing: Server is failing GitHub authentication, please try another login method
redirect: Someone wanted to redirect you to somewhere else. This is emotes.kosmx.dev

delete_account.description: By deleting your account, every information will be permanently removed.
